h1_title: How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor
h2_title: How to Use Seeds and Harvest Ingredients
content: If you've acquired any seeds so far in your journey, you can give them to Chen Loong. He sits behind the Shen Monkey and Xu Dog, up the stairs. Just before the stairs, you can find baskets where you can harvest ingredients, or you can speak to him and the option to harvest the ingredients will appear.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Zodiac_Village_and_Upgrade_Armor.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Zodiac Village and Upgrade Armor', specifically from the subsection 'How to Use Seeds and Harvest Ingredients'.
The content is as follows:
If you've acquired any seeds so far in your journey, you can give them to Chen Loong. He sits behind the Shen Monkey and Xu Dog, up the stairs. Just before the stairs, you can find baskets where you can harvest ingredients, or you can speak to him and the option to harvest the ingredients will appear.
